data.title: Refrigeration, HVAC & Plumbing
data.meta_description: Marick Mechanical offers a comprehensive range of commercial refrigeration, HVAC and plumbing services in Iowa, Nebraska, Kansas, Minnesota, Missouri, South Dakota and Colorado.
data.text:
Marick Mechanical leads the industry in commercial and light industrial refrigeration applications. With our skilled workforce, we can offer our customers everything from 24/7 service to new or remodel installation services, including design builds. We are proud to be an authorized distributor of the Hillphoenix brand but also sell and service all brands of equipment to meet our customer needs. Our technicians here at Marick Mechanical are well-trained and certified in most applications to work on Emerson, Novar, Danfoss and RDM controls. We offer controls service and installation as well as system upgrades and replacements. CO2 technology has been ongoing in our markets for the last 15 years. We have installed and serviced several CO2 systems and have become known as the preferred CO2 contractor for both service and installations here in the Midwest. If a new system is not in the budget, we provide quality refrigerant conversion services to help keep our customers compliant with EPA regulations.

Marick Mechanical is a building solutions provider for Heating, Ventilating & Air Conditioning, Refrigeration (HVACR), specializing in helping building owners and managers control or reduce operating and maintenance costs. We are a full-service HVAC contractor offering design-build construction services, replacement planning, energy recommendations, repair, retrofit and service programs. Our trained, certified technicians are skilled in everything from chillers, cooling towers, boilers, package and split systems, VRF, VRV and various control solutions. Many programs utilize the savings from control solutions, preventive maintenance and energy retrofit work to support systems upgrades or improvements beginning with a capital expense plan.

Frequently, building owners and managers spend more money on their HVAC systems than they have to due to improper maintenance. Our unique approach to preventive measures offers programs that incorporate a building performance assessment with “simple benchmarking”. Benchmarking compares your costs with the costs per square foot of similar facilities which helps us design a maintenance program that ensures proper preventive maintenance tasking, the number one cost saving opportunity for any building.

Our single source capabilities combined with competitive pricing allow Marick Mechanical to help effectively manage your environmental systems. We have expertise in the following HVACR building solutions:

✓ Resolving Specific HVAC Issues & Problems

✓ Implementing Quality Initiatives & Safety Protocols

✓ Designing True, Planned Preventive Maintenance Programs

✓ Offering Energy Savings and Energy Services Work, Controls Solutions

✓ Assisting With Capital Expense Planning, Equipment Replacement Planning
